mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart( customer_mail , goods_no , cart_amount) VALUES( #{customerMail} , #{goodsNo} , #{cartAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no cartNo , c.customer_mail customerMail , c.goods_no goodsNo , c.cart_amount cartAmount , c.update_date updateDate , c.create_date createDate , g.goods_title goodsTitle , g.goods_price goodsPrice , (c.cart_amount * g.goods_price) goodsTotalPrice FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN goods g ON c.goods_no = g.goods_no WHERE cart_no = #{cartNo};

SELECT c.cart_no cartNo , c.customer_mail customerMail , c.goods_no goodsNo , c.cart_amount cartAmount , c.update_date updateDate , c.create_date createDate , f.goods_file_name goodsFileName , f.goods_file_ext goodsFileExt , g.goods_title goodsTitle , g.goods_price goodsPrice , (c.cart_amount * g.goods_price) goodsTotalPrice , SUM(c.cart_amount * g.goods_price) OVER () totalPrice , COUNT(*) OVER () countCartList FROM cart c LEFT OUTER JOIN goods_file f ON c.goods_no = f.goods_no LEFT OUTER JOIN goods g ON c.goods_no = g.goods_no WHERE customer_mail = #{customerMail};
